English.Text: Your crew stick stoically to the same story. "This man?" the officials say, holding up a picture of their new friend, "have you seen him?" "Oh no, no," your sailors reply. Still, the officials conduct a cursory search, but the man of many talents has no difficulty hiding from them. When they have gone, there is a hearty cheer. "Glad to have you with us!" bellows the Captain. You have a new recruit!
